Uses of Interface
com.sun.mirror.apt.AnnotationProcessorEnvironment

  • Packages that use AnnotationProcessorEnvironment 
    Package Description
    com.sun.mirror.apt
    Classes used to communicate information between annotation processors and an annotation processing tool.
    org.eclipse.jdt.apt.core.env
    This package contains Eclipse extensions to some of the Sun annotation processing APIs.

      Constructor Description
